text: The Bahamas competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Twenty competitors, nineteen men and one woman, took part in thirteen events in four sports. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete
